data.current_description: Compile a PDF document from a specific template
data.summary_suggestion: Generate PDF from template with JSON data
data.description_suggestion: Generates a dynamic PDF document by compiling a LaTeX template with provided JSON data. Requires the template token for identification and JSON payload containing the data to populate template variables. Returns the compiled PDF document. The operation processes template logic statements, tables, and charts based on the input data to produce a high-quality, optimized PDF. Authentication via Adv-Security-Token or X-RapidAPI-Key is required.
